dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new investment opportunities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively pursue high-risk investments, willing to take on significant uncertainty for potential gains.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability, avoiding high-risk investments in favor of steady returns.

dimensions.label: Technical Expertise
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly analyze and understand complex technical concepts, often going beyond the surface level.
Your FarTwin will focus on understanding the overall strategy and big picture, rather than delving into intricate details.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach data analysis?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on numerical data and statistical models to inform decisions.
Your FarTwin will consider the broader context and nuances, using intuition and experience to guide analysis.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage with new information through hands-on experience and interactive learning.
Your FarTwin will thoroughly reflect on new ideas, analyzing their implications and considering different perspectives.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach international issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will consider the global implications of decisions, seeking to understand diverse perspectives and interests.
Your FarTwin will prioritize domestic concerns, prioritizing national interests over international cooperation.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach career development?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for leadership roles and recognition, seeking to make a significant impact in their field.
Your FarTwin will prioritize job security and stability, focusing on building a solid foundation rather than rapid advancement.

dimensions.label: Personal Values
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong connections with others, seeking to form close and meaningful relationships.
Your FarTwin will value their independence and focus on maintaining a healthy balance between social interactions and alone time.
